thread.title: Madden trolls Patriots for digging themselves huge hole in the first half of Super Bowl LI
thread.title_full: Madden trolls Patriots for digging themselves huge hole in the first half of Super Bowl LI

title: Madden trolls Patriots for digging themselves huge hole in the first half of Super Bowl LI
text:
Feb 5, 2017 at 9:06p ET 0Shares 
It was only a matter of time before Twitter began sounding off on the Falcons getting off to a quick start against the Patriots at Super Bowl LI. But instead of ripping New England for falling behind 21-3 in the first half, the Twitter handle for “Madden NFL 17” offered some advice on how to deal with the whole situation. 
— EA SPORTS Madden NFL (@EAMaddenNFL) February 6, 2017 
Yeah, Patriots fans would probably love to have a do-over for the first 30 minutes Sunday, especially with a chance to win a record fifth Super Bowl title on the line. 0
